alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:57AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Feet County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence on how much snow will fall in Colorado Springs is low. Snow fall amounts will depend on the exact track of the storm and how fast it intensifies once it gets onto the plains.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
